reviews.review: There's not much to say about Portal that hasn't already been said, but in any case, it's a fantastic game that has aged very well since its release in 2007. Portal's clean graphics, engaging portal gun mechanic, and clever puzzles are just a few of its positives that lend to it being an enjoyable, compact game. It is a worthy addition to anyone's video game collection, and its high replayability ensures that you will be playing and replaying it for years to come.

This game is short. Not going to lie and say it isn't. However it is one of the best puzzle games and helped define the genre. The humor and visuals still hold up to this day, which is impressive for a seven to eight year game. For the price of ten bucks it is definitely worth it however, try and get it on sale for two bucks or even spend five and get Portal 2 with the bundle (Must be on sale). Either way great game for the price and plenty of easter eggs to find.

Шедевр, не имеющий аналогов. Потрясающая задумка и реализация. Здесь есть всё: и коварный невидимый враг и верный молчаливый друг, тайники и подсказки, открывающие завесу тайны над происходящим, милые турели, которые просят не трогать их, но при этом хотят Вас убить.Пройдя игру Вы не только спасёте жизнь своей героини, но и узнаете, как проход через портал влияет на кинетическую энергию тела!  Настоятельно рекомендую всем любителям головоломок.

Words fail to discribed the first expierence I had with this game. Portal is a marvelous chapter in the history and development in gaming. Though not hard necessarily, it does require you to think in strict logical sequence from the unique physics of the game (or just relentless trial and error that is). From infinite falls to vertical-to-horizontal cannons, Portal tasks you with changing your perspective from linier 3 demensions to something else (not quite sure really, circular 3 demensions maybe). From bullet orgy shooters to empire building god simulators no other game I have played has impacted me in the same way. Portal is not hard it is different.

Un juego fantástico, una trama muy bien cuidada, no es el tipico juego de puzzles, la temática de los portales hacen a este juego único. 
Una historia breve de unas 3 horas más o menos pero muy buena y rejugable, además tiene despues de pasarte la historia unos retos muy dificiles que alargan el juego 5 horas o 10 más. Muy recomendable para los amantes de los juegos de acertijos y las breves pero buenas historias. Recomiendo tambien la segunda parte para completar esta breve historia.

Things to know before pressing the 1500 MegaWatt Aperture Science Heavy Duty Super-Colliding Super Button:

1. It's one of the best puzzle games ever made
2. It's based on a Half-Life 2 engine, which you are expected to use to the very limit
3. Getting all the achievements is hard, you're not gonna be able to do it without youtube
4. Amazing and unique atmosphere, makes you feel like a lab rat for real
5. Cake is a lie
6. You, [subject name here], are a pride of [subject hometown here]

And you should never, under any circumstances [bzzzzzttt]

Portal 1是一个相对短小的游戏，有一半的关卡接近于教学关。然而“传送门”这一新颖的玩法依然让人印象深刻。作品表现了主人公Chell和想要通过致命实验杀死她的人工智能GLaDOS斗争的故事，同时揭示了过去在Aperture Science秘密实验室中，GLaDOS失控引发的灾难。个人认为，作品表达了对于人工智能失控的担忧，以及对于非人道人体实验的谴责。
片尾的那首<Still alive>，用柔和婉约的曲调唱出让人毛骨悚然的事实。For the good of all of us, except the ones who are dead，多么讽刺，纵观近来世界的右翼民族主义思潮，似乎现实中很多人也是颇持有这套论调……这么说来，GLaDOS也是个非常合格的AI呢～
Um dos meus jogos favoritos da vida. Vale a pena demais!

This is a great game that I would recommend to anyone.

P.S. The cake is a lie
Zajebista gra :D

El juego que asentó las bases de la saga, es muy buen juego de puzzles.

Consiste en lanzar portales y superar distintas pruebas de los laboratorios de Aperture Science, unas instalaciones científicas.

Es muy entretenido, propone retos interesantes y tiene un apartado visual muy original.

Algo corto y quizás para algunos repetitivo.
